issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Support projections between children of UnionDatasets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11749](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11749). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11174 adds support for arbitrary expressions in projection. It'd be useful to have that power when unifying disparate child datasets. For example, even the simple case where a column is renamed in a newer data file currently cannot be accommodated.
